committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend section 3323 of title 5, United States Code, to remove the restrictions that an annuitant reappointed as a Federal employee may serve only at the will of the appointing authority.

summary.text: Eliminates the restrictions that civil service and Foreign Service annuitants who are reemployed in the civil service may serve only at the will of the appointing authority.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 3323 of title 5, United States Code, to remove the restrictions that an annuitant reappointed as a Federal employee may serve only at the will of the appointing authority.
